title: Chicken the dog home safe and sound Tory Burch
text:
Fashion designer Tory Burch announced the safe return of her furry friend, Chicken.

Thanks to an unidentified NYC couple who found the 7-month-old, 8-pound pooch, Burch and Chicken were reunited, she said on Wednesday morning.

Our Chicken is home! Thank you to the couple who found her, kept her safe and brought her home. Thank you so much to everyone who reached out and for all of your support — especially the pet-lovers of NYC 🧡 pic.twitter.com/av04Zl8qpS — Tory Burch (@toryburch) October 9, 2019

"Thank you to the couple who found her, kept her safe and brought her home," she wrote along with a photo of her light brown miniature poodle. "Thank you so much to everyone who reached out and for all of your support — especially the pet-lovers of NYC."

The designer first posted a lost dog flyer on her Instagram account Tuesday with photos and details of Chicken, pleading for the public's help and offering a $10K reward.

"We are heartbroken, please help us find chicken, a couple has her and found her on 56th and Madison at 12am on Sunday night," Burch wrote on the flyer.

She continued, "They took her and said they would take her to get her chip scanned. She was not hurt but please help and ask that couple to bring her to us."

It's unclear how Burch got in touch with the couple or if a reward was paid, but she confirmed across her social media channels that Chicken is "home safe."
description: Tory Burch said her dog, Chicken, is home safe after she went missing on Sunday in New York City.
